full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA YI DAM SRUNG MA'I TSOGS LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES BLA MA YI DAM SRUNG MA'I TSOGS LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD STOBS LDAN PA RDZONGS DKAR DKAR BZHUGS RGYAL BA BRTZEGS CHOS MDZAD KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,'DI KYANG SKYE 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
